name: Bloom 4.1
description:
12″ x 16″ | glass, 24k gold smalti, grout on cradled art board

Abstracted botanical forms are layered with mechanical and structural elements. The negative space from a bicycle sprocket forms the ‘green bloom’ and linear elements in glass stringer refer to structure and support. The organic forms are realized in grayscale, suggesting the overlooked but ever-present and powerfully regenerative natural context for the urban world. Living in urbanized settings requires new ways of seeing and connecting with nature.

name: 4.1 | 8x10
description:
8" x 10"
glass, 24k gold smalti, grout on cradled art board

Impel places cognitive experience within a social context, exploring how connections, interactions, and impingements contribute to the ongoing change and evolution in how we see ourselves in relation to the world.

For these pieces, I developed some Impel compositions using tight crops to focus on the interactions and impingements in the social landscape. Using images of oil+water as visual referents, Impel 4.0 is cut in a bold palette of coral, purple and ambers.

name: 16 | 8x8
description:
Emblems were made between 2006-2008.

Serving as color studies, these small pieces were drawn from a larger composition, Trace, to create open-ended pieces that point to something beyond themselves. Based on a biological/cellular visual referent, Trace considers the continual change and movement in our daily 
lived experience. Shards of recycled vintage china and ceramics are repurpopsed as design elements to integrate the color palettes and point to an original meaning of ‘emblem’ as inlaid, mosaic work.

8“ x 8”  | vitreous glass, vintage china and ceramics and grout on wood

name: Lilac | 8x8
description:
8" x 8" 
glass, 24k gold smalti, grout in framed in anodized aluminum

In BLOOM a meandering path of gleaming white gold draws you into a flourishing garden.

BLOOM comes ready for instant hanging or can be permanently installed within a background of surround tile.

name: Sky | 8x8
description:
8" x 8"
glass, 24k gold smalti and grout framed in anodized aluminum

Verge is inspired by the Lake Michigan lakeshore: water at the verge of sky and land.

Each piece comes ready to hang or can be installed into a background of surround tile.

name: Persimmon | 8x10
description:
8" x 10"

glass, 24k gold smalti, hardware, grout on cradled art board

Part of my interest in creating a moment of surprise and discovery comes from learning to see Chicago from the El. The windows of the El frame fleeting glimpses of other lives and spaces and lines. My drawing practice is generally inspired by forms and lines found in nature. Curves and foliage and growth potential are in evidence. But a new set of lines is emerging. These feel like urban forms with motion and direction and angular geometry that I associate with the built environment at various scales, possibly as seen through a window.

name: Spring | 10x10
description: 10" x 10" glass, 24k gold smalti, grout on cradled art board Twist celebrates life and growth and vitality. The rhythms of seasons and growing cycles are deeply encoded as a result of growing up on a grain farm on the Canadian prairies. I notice plants. Climbers and vines are particularly captivating: stunning lines are formed by incessant movement and twisting toward the light. I find the negative space equally compelling. Ideas for hanging Twist

name: Bold | 8x10
description:
8" x 10"
glass, 24k gold smalti, grout on cradled art board

Letter forms are inherently engaging to our pattern-detecting, information-decoding obsessed minds.

Transform your space with shimmering glass art. Each 8" x 10" hand-cut glass mosaic comes ready to hang.

name: Robin's Egg | 8x8
description: Mosaic Elements are 8" x 8" art objects. Transform your space with shimmering glass Mosaic Elements. Whether used as art pieces or permanently installed on a backsplash or fireplace, Mosaic Elements create a riveting visual feature. Your space can be transformed in an instant by hanging Mosaic Elements just the way you want--in singles or multiples, positioned in any orientation--and by changing it up as often as you like. Ideas for hanging GLYPH The GLYPH series explores the creative potential of the written letter. Display GLYPHS in groups or multiple orientations to add a bold graphic element to your space. The story of GLYPH Each 8" x 8" hand-cut glass mosaic comes ready to be displayed as is or installed within a background of surround tile. Hanging/Installing Order glass samples
